item.title: The sync gap
item.description:
ðŸ”„ Why Mobile Numbers Aren’t Syncing from AD to Entra ID

TL;DR: Your AD mobile numbers aren’t updating in Entra ID Hybrid environment? It’s likely that BypassDirSyncOverridesEnabled is not what you expect it to be.

ðŸš¨ The Problem

In hybrid Microsoft Entra ID environments, admins are surprised to find that mobile numbers in Active Directory don’t sync to Entra for some users â€” even though all other attributes do perfectly. You also don’t see any signs of failure on Entra Connect log.
